EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Data_Workshop_Roadshow_2015.Confirm - Fort Worth
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed: Pivotal Big Data Roadshow Fort Worth
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Thank you for registering for the upcoming Pivotal Big Data Roadshow <http://www.pivotal.io/big-data/data-roadshow/fortworth> in Fort Worth. Please find the event details below:
Date: April 30, 2015 Time: Registration begins @ 8:00AM / Keynote begins @ 9:00AM / Session #1 begins @ 9:45AM / Session #2 begins @ 10:45AM / Session #3 begins @ 12:45PM Location: DFW Airport Marriott South, 4151 Centreport Drive, Forth Worth, TX 76155
{{my.Save the Date - Fort Worth:default=edit me}}
To fully participate in the hands-on workshop, please bring your laptop with VMware Player installed and wireless connectivity enabled.
Questions? Please contact us via email <"mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io> or visit our website <http://www.pivotal.io>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
